column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////So I've been doing this ketotic diet thing where I don't eat carbs
column3: or dairy 6 days a week.  It's a pretty miserable way to live
column4: or so I thought it would be
column5: but I'm actually faring okay with it.  I do break the diet once a week on cheat days though
column6: and what better way to do it than at Common Bond?  My last two cheat days have been at the Breakfast Klub with fried chicken
column9: also an excellent way to load up on carbs - but really
column10: Common Bond packs the happiest punch per bite.
